title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 19, ch. VII, pt. 208 - Special Rules for Health, Safety and Integrity in Combative Sports
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 19, ch. VII, pt. 208 - Special Rules for Health, Safety and Integrity in Combative Sports

State Regulations
§ 208.1 - Medical fitness required
§ 208.2 - Medical examination required for license
§ 208.3 - Medical examination before contests and exhibitions
§ 208.4 - Reporting of injury or illness
§ 208.5 - Ringside physicians
§ 208.6 - Duties of ringside physician
§ 208.7 - When ringside physician may enter ring
§ 208.8 - Examination of combatant after injury
§ 208.9 - Reporting of combatant's injury
§ 208.10 - Examination required due to consecutive losses
§ 208.11 - Medical suspensions in case of knockouts, submissions and technical knockouts
§ 208.12 - Mandatory resting period for combatants between matches
§ 208.13 - Required seminars
§ 208.14 - Weight loss
§ 208.15 - Insurance to be provided by licensed promoters
§ 208.16 - Minimum safety standards for all combative sports matches and exhibitions held within the state
§ 208.17 - Honest competition
§ 208.18 - Managers' records
§ 208.19 - Manager forbidden to act as matchmaker
§ 208.20 - Manager's interest in combatants
§ 208.21 - Promoter not to act as manager
§ 208.22 - Matchmakers not to employ boxers
§ 208.23 - Matchmaker not to act as manager
§ 208.24 - Restrictions on officials
§ 208.25 - Duty of licensee to report offer to conduct sham or collusive contest
§ 208.26 - Required disclosures for boxing promoters
§ 208.27 - Required disclosures for boxing sanctioning organizations
§ 208.28 - Authority of Commission to inspect before entry into dressing rooms
§ 208.29 - Prohibited substances and the authority of Commission to require drug testing of licensed athletes

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 19, ch. VII, pt. 208

Statutory authority: Unconsolidated Laws, § 8901; L. 1996, ch. 708

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
